Data.Name: AddStringFieldDesc
Data.Value: Create a new string field for the current entry.

Data.Name: AttachedExistsAlready
Data.Value: The following file has already been attached to the current entry:

Data.Name: AttachNewRename
Data.Value: Do you wish to rename the new file or overwrite the existing attached file?

Data.Name: AttachNewRenameRemarks0
Data.Value: Click [Yes] to rename the new file.

Data.Name: AttachNewRenameRemarks1
Data.Value: Click [No] to overwrite the existing attached file.

Data.Name: AutoGeneratedPasswordSettings
Data.Value: Automatically generated passwords for new entries

Data.Name: AutoRememberOpenLastFile
Data.Value: Remember and automatically open last used database on startup

Data.Name: AutoSaveAtExit
Data.Value: Automatically save when closing/locking the database

Data.Name: AutoShowSoonToExpireEntries
Data.Value: Show entries that will expire soon (if any)

Data.Name: AutoTypeEntrySelectionDescLong
Data.Value: Multiple entries have been found for the currently active window. Please select the entry, which you want to auto-type into the active window.

Data.Name: AutoTypeEntrySelectionDescShort
Data.Value: Multiple entries exist for the current window.

Data.Name: AutoTypeGlobalHint
Data.Value: If you want KeePass to search the active database for a matching entry and auto-type it, use the 'Global auto-type' hot key.

Data.Name: AutoTypeMatchByTitle
Data.Value: An entry matches if its title is contained in the target window title

Data.Name: AutoTypeObfuscationHint
Data.Value: Auto-type obfuscation may not work with all windows.

Data.Name: AutoTypePrependInitSeqForIE
Data.Value: Prepend special initialization sequence for Internet Explorer windows

Data.Name: AutoTypeReleaseAltWithKeyPress
Data.Value: Send Alt keypress when only the Alt modifier is active

Data.Name: AutoTypeSelectedNoEntry
Data.Value: To use the 'Auto-type selected entry' hot key, you first need to select an entry in KeePass.

Data.Name: AutoTypeSequenceInvalid
Data.Value: The specified auto-type sequence is invalid.

Data.Name: AutoTypeUnknownPlaceholder
Data.Value: The following auto-type placeholder or special key code is unknown/unsupported:

Data.Name: AutoTypeXDoToolRequired
Data.Value: The 'xdotool' utility/package is required for auto-type.

Data.Name: CannotMoveEntriesBcsGroup
Data.Value: Cannot move entries because they aren't stored in the same group.

Data.Name: ChangeMasterKeyIntroShort
Data.Value: You are changing the composite master key for the currently-open database.

Data.Name: CheckForUpdAtStart
Data.Value: Check for update at KeePass startup

Data.Name: ClipboardClearInSeconds
Data.Value: Clipboard will be cleared in [PARAM] seconds

Data.Name: CloseButtonMinimizes
Data.Value: Close button [X] minimizes main window instead of terminating the application

Data.Name: ConfigAffectAdmin
Data.Value: Changes to the configuration/policy will affect you and all users of this KeePass installation.

Data.Name: ConfigAffectUser
Data.Value: Changes to the configuration/policy will only affect you. Policy flags that are enforced by the administrator are reset after restarting KeePass.

Data.Name: ConfigureAutoTypeDesc
Data.Value: Configure auto-type behaviour for this entry.

Data.Name: ConfigureAutoTypeItemDesc
Data.Value: Associate a window title with a keystroke sequence.

Data.Name: CopyUrlsInsteadOfOpening
Data.Value: Copy URLs to clipboard instead of opening them

Data.Name: CredSaveNone
Data.Value: Do not remember user name and password

Data.Name: CsprojCountError
Data.Value: There must be exactly one .csproj or .vbproj file.

Data.Name: DatabaseDescPrompt
Data.Value: Enter a short description of the database or leave it empty.

Data.Name: DatabaseMaintenanceDesc
Data.Value: Here you can maintain the currently opened database.

Data.Name: DatabaseModifiedNoDot
Data.Value: The current database file has been modified

Data.Name: DatabaseNamePrompt
Data.Value: Enter a name for the database or leave it empty.

Data.Name: DatabaseSettingsDesc
Data.Value: Here you can configure various database settings.

Data.Name: DeleteEntriesQuestion
Data.Value: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the selected entries?

Data.Name: DeleteEntriesQuestionSingle
Data.Value: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the selected entry?

Data.Name: DeleteGroupInfo
Data.Value: Deleting a group will also delete all entries and subgroups in that group.

Data.Name: DeleteGroupQuestion
Data.Value: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the selected group?

Data.Name: DisableSaveIfNotModified
Data.Value: Disable 'Save' command (instead of graying it out) if the database hasn't been modified

Data.Name: DocumentationHint
Data.Value: Please see the documentation for more details.

Data.Name: DropToBackOnCopy
Data.Value: Drop to background after copying data to the clipboard

Data.Name: DuplicateStringFieldName
Data.Value: The string field name you specified already exists. String field names must be unique for each entry.

Data.Name: EditEntryDesc
Data.Value: You're editing an existing password entry.

Data.Name: EditGroupDesc
Data.Value: Edit properties of the currently selected group.

Data.Name: EditStringFieldDesc
Data.Value: Edit one of the entry's string fields.

Data.Name: EmptyMasterPw
Data.Value: You have selected to use an empty master password.

Data.Name: EmptyMasterPwHint
Data.Value: An empty master password is not the same as using no master password at all.

Data.Name: EmptyMasterPwQuestion
Data.Value: Are you sure you want to use an empty master password?

Data.Name: EncodingFail
Data.Value: Selected encoding is invalid. The file cannot be interpreted using the selected encoding.

Data.Name: EntryListAutoResizeColumns
Data.Value: Automatically resize entry list columns when resizing the main window

Data.Name: EntryViewHideProtectedCustomStrings
Data.Value: Hide in-memory protected custom strings using asterisks

Data.Name: ExitInsteadOfLockingAfterTime
Data.Value: Exit instead of locking the workspace after the specified time

Data.Name: ExportFileDesc
Data.Value: Export data to an external file.

Data.Name: ExportHtmlDesc
Data.Value: Export entries to a HTML file.

Data.Name: FieldNameExistsAlready
Data.Value: The entered name exists already and cannot be used.

Data.Name: FieldNameInvalid
Data.Value: The entered name is invalid and cannot be used.

Data.Name: FieldRefInvalidChars
Data.Value: The selected field, which identifies the source entry, contains illegal characters (like '{', '}', newline characters, ...).

Data.Name: FieldRefMultiMatch
Data.Value: Multiple entries match the specified identifying field.

Data.Name: FieldRefMultiMatchHint
Data.Value: To avoid ambiguity, entries can be identified by their UUIDs, which are unique.

Data.Name: FileChanged
Data.Value: The file on disk/server has changed since it was loaded. Probably someone else has edited and saved the database.

Data.Name: FileChangedOverwrite
Data.Value: Save the current database to the file. Changes made by the other user will be lost.

Data.Name: FileChangedSync
Data.Value: Load the file on disk/server and merge it with the current database in memory.

Data.Name: FileExtInstallFailed
Data.Value: Failed to create the file association. Make sure you have write access to the file associations list.

Data.Name: FileExtInstallSuccess
Data.Value: Successfully associated KDBX files with KeePass! KDBX files will now be opened by KeePass when you double-click on them.

Data.Name: FileLockedBy
Data.Value: The specified file is currently locked by the following user:

Data.Name: FileLockedWarning
Data.Value: KeePass will open the file, but note that you might overwrite changes each other when saving.

Data.Name: FileNameContainsSemicolonError
Data.Value: This file path contains a semicolon (;) and therefore cannot be processed. Replace the semicolon and repeat the procedure.

Data.Name: FileNotFoundError
Data.Value: The specified file could not be found.

Data.Name: FileSaveQClosing
Data.Value: Save database changes before closing the file?

Data.Name: FileSaveQExiting
Data.Value: Save database changes before exiting KeePass?

Data.Name: FileSaveQLocking
Data.Value: Save database changes before locking the workspace?

Data.Name: FileSaveQOpCancelClosing
Data.Value: The file will not be closed.

Data.Name: FileSaveQOpCancelLocking
Data.Value: The KeePass workspace will not be locked.

Data.Name: FileSaveQOpNoClosing
Data.Value: Discard all changes made to the database and close the file.

Data.Name: FileSaveQOpNoExiting
Data.Value: Discard all changes made to the database and exit KeePass.

Data.Name: FileSaveQOpNoLocking
Data.Value: Discard all changes made to the database and lock the KeePass workspace.

Data.Name: FileSaveQOpYesClosing
Data.Value: Save all changes made to the database and close the file.

Data.Name: FileSaveQOpYesExiting
Data.Value: Save all changes made to the database and exit KeePass.

Data.Name: FileSaveQOpYesLocking
Data.Value: Save all changes made to the database and lock the KeePass workspace.

Data.Name: FileVerifyHashFail
Data.Value: The new file's content does not match the data that KeePass has written, i.e. writing to the file has failed and it might be corrupted now.

Data.Name: FileVerifyHashFailRec
Data.Value: Please try saving again, and if that fails, save the database to a different location.

Data.Name: FocusQuickFindOnUntray
Data.Value: Focus quick search box when restoring from tray

Data.Name: FocusResultsAfterQuickFind
Data.Value: Focus entry list after a successful quick search (toolbar)

Data.Name: FormatNoDatabaseDesc
Data.Value: This file format doesn't support database descriptions.

Data.Name: FormatNoDatabaseName
Data.Value: This file format doesn't support database names.

Data.Name: FormatNoRootEntries
Data.Value: This file format doesn't support root groups. All entries in the root group are moved to the first subgroup.

Data.Name: FormatNoSubGroupsInRoot
Data.Value: To export to this file format, the root group must have at least one subgroup.

Data.Name: FormatOnlyOneAttachment
Data.Value: This file format only supports one attachment per entry. Only the first attachment is saved, the others are ignored.

Data.Name: GenerateCountDesc
Data.Value: Enter number of passwords to generate.

Data.Name: GenerateCountLongDesc
Data.Value: Please enter the number of passwords to generate:

Data.Name: GenProfileSaveDesc
Data.Value: Save current settings as a profile.

Data.Name: GenProfileSaveDescLong
Data.Value: Please enter a name for the new password generator profile, or select an existing profile name to overwrite it:

Data.Name: GroupCannotStoreEntries
Data.Value: The selected group cannot store any entries.

Data.Name: HelpSourceNoLocalOption
Data.Value: This option is disabled, because local help is not installed.

Data.Name: HelpSourceSelectionDesc
Data.Value: Choose between local help and online help center.

Data.Name: HomepageVisitQuestion
Data.Value: Do you want to visit the KeePass homepage now?

Data.Name: HotKeyAltOnly
Data.Value: It is highly recommended not to use global hot keys with only Alt or Alt-Shift as modifier.

Data.Name: HotKeyAltOnlyHint
Data.Value: Recommended modifiers are Ctrl-Alt, Ctrl-Shift and Ctrl-Alt-Shift.

Data.Name: HotKeyAltOnlyQuestion
Data.Value: Are you sure you want to use the specified hot keys?

Data.Name: ImageFormatFeatureUnsupported
Data.Value: This file uses a file format feature that is not supported.

Data.Name: ImportMustRead
Data.Value: It is indispensable that you read the documentation about this import method before continuing.

Data.Name: ImportMustReadQuestion
Data.Value: Have you understood how the import process works and want to start it now?

Data.Name: InvalidUserPassword
Data.Value: The specified user name / password combination is invalid.

Data.Name: Kdb3KeePassLibC
Data.Value: The KeePassLibC library is required to open and save KDB files created by KeePass 1.x.

Data.Name: KeePassLibCNotWindows
Data.Value: Importing/exporting data from/to KDB files is only supported on Windows (because a library is used that contains the core code of KeePass 1.x, which is Windows-only).

Data.Name: KeePassLibCNotWindowsHint
Data.Value: Please use a different file format for migrating your data.

Data.Name: KeyFileError
Data.Value: The specified key file could not be found or its format is unknown.

Data.Name: KeyFileUseExisting
Data.Value: Use an existing file as key file

Data.Name: LanguageSelected
Data.Value: The selected language has been activated. KeePass must be restarted in order to load the language.

Data.Name: LockOnMinimize
Data.Value: Lock workspace when minimizing main window

Data.Name: LockOnSessionLock
Data.Value: Lock workspace when locking Windows, switching user or sleeping

Data.Value: Composite master key has been changed!

Data.Name: MasterKeyChangedSavePrompt
Data.Value: Save the database now in order to get the new key applied.

Data.Name: MasterKeyChangeInfo

Data.Name: MasterKeyChangeQ

Data.Name: MasterKeyChangeRec

Data.Name: MasterPasswordMinLengthFailed
Data.Value: The master password must be at least {PARAM} characters long!

Data.Name: MasterPasswordMinQualityFailed
Data.Value: The estimated quality of the master password must be at least {PARAM} bits!

Data.Value: Minimize main window after locking the workspace

Data.Value: Minimize to tray instead of taskbar

Data.Name: NativeLibUse

Data.Name: NoFileAccessRead
Data.Value: The operating system didn't grant KeePass read access to the specified file.

Data.Name: NoXslFile

Data.Name: ObjectNotFound

Data.Name: OptimizeForScreenReader

Data.Value: The file header is corrupted! Some header data was declared but is not present.

Data.Name: FileLoadFailed
Data.Value: Failed to load the specified file!

Data.Name: FileNewVerReq
Data.Value: A newer KeePass version is required to open this file.

Data.Name: FileSaveCorruptionWarning
Data.Value: The target file might be in a corrupted state. Please try saving again, and if that fails, save the database to a different location.

Data.Name: FileSaveFailed
Data.Value: Failed to save the current database to the specified location!

Data.Name: FileSigInvalid
Data.Value: The file signature is invalid. Either the file isn't a KeePass database file at all or it is corrupted.

Data.Name: FileUnknownCipher
Data.Value: The file is encrypted using an unknown encryption algorithm!

Data.Name: FileUnknownCompression
Data.Value: The file is compressed using an unknown compression algorithm!

Data.Name: FinalKeyCreationFailed
Data.Value: Failed to create the final encryption/decryption key!

Data.Name: FrameworkNotImplExcp
Data.Value: The .NET framework/runtime under which KeePass is currently running does not support this operation.

Data.Name: InvalidCompositeKeyHint
Data.Value: Make sure the composite key is correct and try again.

Data.Name: KeePass1xHint
Data.Value: In order to import KeePass 1.x KDB files, create a new 2.x database file and click 'File' -> 'Import' in the main menu. In the import dialog, choose 'KeePass KDB (1.x)' as file format.

Data.Name: MasterSeedLengthInvalid
Data.Value: The length of the master key seed is invalid!

Data.Name: OldFormat
Data.Value: The selected file appears to be an old format

Data.Name: UserAccountKeyError
Data.Value: The operating system did not grant KeePass read/write access to the user profile folder, where the protected user key is stored.
